pr_title: DDF-5743 Added new property for solr downloads

timeline.message: DDF-5743 Added new property for solr downloads

timeline.bodyText: ❓ Why 7.4 instead of solr.version which is currently 7.7.2?
timeline.author: pklinef

replies.bodyText: I thought it was time for a downgrade :-) I'll change it to 7.7.2
replies.author: shaundmorris

replies.bodyText: Actually meant to keep the property ${solr.version} there
replies.author: shaundmorris

timeline.bodyText:
The SHA512 checksum for Solr 7.7.2 should always be the same regardless of source.
❓ Should the SHA512 be a property too?
timeline.author: pklinef
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -99,12 +99,13 @@
                         </goals>
                         <configuration>
                             <url>
-                                http://artifacts.codice.org/content/repositories/thirdparty/org/apache/archive/solr/${solr.version}/solr-${solr.version}.zip
+                              ${solr.download.url}/lucene/solr/${solr.version}/solr-${solr.version}.zip
                             </url>
                             <unpack>true</unpack>
                             <failOnError>true</failOnError>
-                            <sha512>aca27ff6942872a571160f49f5e4d43090dbe9bb37da0d1999557e1655f25055173ef999bfb8eba8f19f19b9c438b43205c805d0d294b9756cf5c0aaf66a656a</sha512>
-                            <checkSignature>true</checkSignature>
+                            <!--temporarily disable check so the zip can be obtained from multiple sources

replies.bodyText: Looks like it works now I was probably doing something else wrong so removed this section.
replies.author: shaundmorris

timeline.message: DDF-5742 Added back checkSignature and sha512
